channel.title: Characters on NaNoWriMo 2019
channel.description: Recent content in Characters on NaNoWriMo 2019

item.title: Reyna Mae Roebuck
item.description: Reyna Mae Roebuck is a 23-year-old gym assistant who enjoys watching sport, escapology and spreading fake news on Facebook. She is accurate and mechanical, but can also be very oblivious and a bit late. She is a British Christian. She started studying sports science at college but never finished the course. Physically, Reyna is not in great shape. She needs to lose quite a lot of weight. She is average-height with olive skin, golden hair and blue eyes.

item.title: Jack Steele Huron
item.description: 24-year-old admin assistant who enjoys bowling. He is kind and reliable, but can also be very lazy and a bit moody. He is an American Christian who defines himself as straight. He has a degree in business studies. He is allergic to Brazil nuts. He is obsessed with selfies. Physically, Brendan is slightly overweight but otherwise in good shape. He is average-height with light skin, blonde hair and blue eyes.
